verses.verse: <S%H3117>"For,<s%> behold, the day <S%H935>comes,<s%> it <S%H1197>burns<s%> as a <S%H8574>furnace;<s%> and all the <S%H2086>proud,<s%> and all who <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7564>wickedness,<s%> will be <S%H7179>stubble;<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> will burn them <S%H3857>up,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "that it shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them neither <S%H8328>root<s%> nor <S%H6057>branch.<s%>

But to you who <S%H3373>fear<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H2224>arise<s%> with <S%H4832>healing<s%> in its <S%H3671>wings.<s%> You will go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H6335>leap<s%> like <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall.<s%>

You shall tread <S%H6072>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> for they will be <S%H665>ashes<s%> under the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6213>make,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to him in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>

<S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I will send you <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>

He will <S%H7725>turn<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> to the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> lest I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with a <S%H2764>curse.<s%>"
